ðŸ“– Summary: RustPotato is a Rust-based privilege escalation tool that implements the GodPotato technique. It leverages DCOM and RPC to exploit SeImpersonatePrivilege and gain SYSTEM privileges, featuring a TCP-based reverse shell and indirect NTAPI calls for token manipulation.
